# KeyPath

**Class**

A key path from a specific root type to a specific resulting value type.

## Declaration

```swift
class KeyPath<Root, Value>
```

## Overview

The most common way to make an instance of this type is by using a key-path expression like `\SomeClass.someProperty`. For more information, see [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Expressions.html#ID563] in *[https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/]*.

## Key Paths

- **PartialKeyPath**: A partially type-erased key path, from a concrete root type to any resulting value type.
- **AnyKeyPath**: A type-erased key path, from any root type to any resulting value type.

## Inherits From

- PartialKeyPath

## Inherited By

- WritableKeyPath

## Conforms To

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
